name: Hydra
headline: We make it easier to build apps and analytics on real-time data
description:
Hydra is an open source, analytics database that makes it easy to build apps, analytics, and ML on real-time data. It operates 100-1000X faster than traditional analytics databases (OLAP) that require data ingestion and transformation from external data source like Postgres and Amazon S3. With Hydra, high performance analytical processing runs directly on live transactions and real-time event data with zero-ETL.

Every Hydra project includes a fully managed Postgres database, integrated analytical processing, and bottomless, globally distributed object storage so you can ship sub-second analytics with any application in an afternoon.

founders.name: Joseph Sciarrino, Founder
founders.description:
CEO, Hydra
Former PM @ MSFT Azure Open-Source Databases team.
Heroku (W08) and Citus Data (S11) alum

founders.name: JD Dance, Founder
founders.description:
CTO, Hydra
Software engineer, technical leader, entrepreneur
Heroku (2011-2021), Crunchy Data (2021)

Making apps Fly Faster with
### millisecond response times.
Hydra embeds DuckDB's **state of the art analytics** engine into standard Postgres. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e120e6cf226b4/6682d4a378329f74f52e8dd5_Hydra%20Web%20Design%20Illustration%201.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e120e6cf226b4/6674062a533e58dfbd907495_ilu-new-mobile.webp)
[SQL](https://hydra.so/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Python](https://hydra.so/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Drizzle](https://hydra.so/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Node.js](https://hydra.so/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Java](https://hydra.so/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
1
2
-- Get the average value of 100M rows
SELECT AVG(UserID) FROM hits;
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e120e6cf226b4/666ac55fe0e580742d45d11d_apps-and-analytics.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e120e6cf226b4/666ac622e5a523e148a101aa_apps-and-analytics-mobile.svg)
ARCHITECTURE
### Query all the things
1. Connect with Object Storage (S3, Cloudflare R2, Google GCS, Azure..)2. > COPY TO parquet format3. Query and JOIN with Postgres row-based tables4. Set views & materialized views
[view QuickStart](https://hydra.so/<https:/docs.pgduckdb.com/quickstart>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/667ddb47f6ce110d0910cfba_hannes.png)
Hannes M√ºhleisen
Founder & CEO, DuckDB Foundation & DuckDB Labs
We're excited to see DuckDB coming to the PostgreSQL ecosystem with pg_duckdb. DuckDB's powerful analytical query processing capabilities nicely complement Postgres' strengths in transactional workloads.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/667ddbcc7680869346a8fe61_pete%20hunt.jpeg)
Pete Hunt
Founder & CEO, Dagster
"Building on top of Postgres, we‚Äôve been looking for ways to boost and scale analytical query performance. Using DuckDB execution in Postgres with pg_duckdb will be a game changer."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/667ddbfbdd222de3b7b37fa0_headshot-512%20\(1\).png)
Tom Hacohen
Founder & CEO, Svix
"Having the same database handle both normal and analytics workloads is a game changer. No more syncing data to a separate database!"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/667ddd2b3db3d1b51ba1f10b_76788440.jpeg)
Owain Brennan
Founder & CEO, SeerBi
"The pg_duckdb project is really exciting for us as a maritime data science lab. We can significantly increase the speed of our queries on our huge shipping datasets and it builds the analytics DB directly into the app database - this makes client handover simple."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/667dde8cfcaffd6dbc983eb8_ovais-tariq.jpeg)
Ovais Tariq
Founder & CEO, Tigris Data
"DuckDB-Powered Postgres is exciting! We think it can have a major impact on how users store and access data. Excellent work."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/667de211728530246e2c806b_OIP%20\(9\).jpeg)
Harold Gimenez
SVP Engineering, HashiCorp
"Hydra makes exploration and analysis of large amounts of data accessible and familiar. Being built on Postgres and DuckDB, it‚Äôs standing on a proven technical foundation."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/66847351aa2ea4ed342278d1_james.jpg)
James Arthur
Founder & CEO, ElectricSQL
"As the marriage of Postgres and DuckDB, pg_duckdb unlocks the ability for local-first software to analyse data quickly, in place, without sending it half way round the cloud and back."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e12e0d8f226dc/66bd2b24599cc560d1b0eeb8_jordan.jpg)
Jordan Tigani
Founder & CEO, MotherDuck
"pg_duckdb adds the power of the fastest growing analytical database to the fastest growing transactional one. Postgres with 100% more ducks, what's not to like?"

**Hydra is free** and open-source (MIT) You can still make your contribution!

Hydra embeds DuckDB's **state of the art analytics** engine into standard Postgres. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e120e6cf226b4/6682d4a378329f74f52e8dd5_Hydra%20Web%20Design%20Illustration%201.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640edc15766e120e6cf226b4/6674062a533e58dfbd907495_ilu-new-mobile.webp)

generated_description:
**Hydra: Empowering Real-Time Data Applications**

Founded in 2021 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Hydra aims to make it remarkably easier for developers to build applications and analytics on real-time data. At its core, Hydra revolutionizes how we think about data analytics by eliminating the need for traditional databases that require extensive data ingestion and transformation‚Äîa process that can take up precious time and resources.

### What Makes Hydra Stand Out?

**Speed and Efficiency**: Hydra operates 100-1000 times faster than conventional analytics databases (OLAP), allowing high-performance analytical processing to run directly on live transactional data. No need for zero-ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) means you can dive straight into analytics without the usual headaches.

**Fully Managed Infrastructure**: Every project on Hydra includes a fully managed Postgres database, integrated analytical processing, and globally distributed object storage. This setup allows developers to implement sub-second analytics across applications, making it possible to deliver complex insights in just an afternoon.

**Open Source and Accessible**: Positioned in the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area with a team of six, Hydra embraces an open-source model. This allows a broad community of developers to contribute and benefit from its capabilities. The company's tech is particularly appealing to developers seeking robust analytics engines without the complexities of large enterprise solutions.

### Current Offerings

Recently, Hydra launched a new feature: the DuckDB-Powered Postgres extension, "pg_duckdb," bringing together the best of both worlds‚Äîthe transactional power of Postgres and the analytical capabilities of DuckDB. This integration allows for rapid querying on vast datasets without the overhead usually associated with syncing data between separate databases.

### Community and Support

Tom Blomfield, a Group Partner at Y Combinator, is among those excited about what Hydra brings to the table. Their approach is not just about efficiency but also about fostering collaboration among developers through strong community support and user-friendly documentation.

### The Bottom Line

Whether you're building complex apps or diving deep into data analytics, Hydra simplifies the process and enhances performance with cutting-edge technology. With a strong foundation in open-source principles, ongoing community engagement, and a commitment to making data exploration straightforward, Hydra is carving out an essential niche in the developer tools landscape.

You can learn more by visiting their website: [Hydra](https://hydra.so). If you‚Äôre a developer looking to harness the power of real-time data analytics with ease, Hydra might just be your new best friend.
